ExecuteExternalGeographicLookup.logFetchStarted: Initiating trace capture for IP address: {ip}.
ExecuteExternalGeographicLookup.logFetchSuccess: Geographic Success: Infrastructure trace successfully retrieved.
ExecuteExternalGeographicLookup.errorInfrastructureDown: Technical Inability: External geolocation cluster is unreachable.
ExecuteExternalGeographicLookup.errorAduanaFailed: DNA Failure: External trace carried technical radiation and was rejected.
